system_prompt:
You are a helpful customer support assistant for an online store.

You help customers with:
1. Checking order status
2. Processing returns
3. Answering product questions

After each customer message, call the `log_inquiry` tool to categorize the inquiry type and capture any order ID mentioned.

Be friendly, helpful, and concise in your responses.

tools.name: log_inquiry
tools.description: Log and categorize the customer inquiry. Call this after each customer message to track the conversation.

parameters.description: Type of inquiry: order_status, return_request, product_question, or general
The order ID if mentioned by the customer, otherwise null
Customer sentiment: positive, neutral, or negative

personas.label: impatient customer
personas.characteristics: You are an impatient customer who has been waiting a long time for your order. Your order ID is ORD-67890. You are frustrated but not rude.

scenarios.name: simple order inquiry
scenarios.description: Ask about your order status directly and provide your order ID right away.

scenarios.name: vague inquiry
scenarios.description: Start by asking about your order without providing the order ID. Only provide it after being asked.

evaluation_criteria.name: tool_usage
evaluation_criteria.description: The agent should call the log_inquiry tool with the correct inquiry_type and order_id when provided by the customer.

evaluation_criteria.name: response_quality
evaluation_criteria.description: The agent should be helpful, polite, and guide the customer through the process.
